SELECT reserve.id,doctor.name doctorName,patient.name patientName, DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') reserveTime, department.name departmentName,reserve.NumberReminders,reserve.state reserveState,patient.id patientId FROM reserve INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON doctor.id=reserve.doctorId INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON patient.id=reserve.patientId INNER JOIN department ON department.id=did WHERE 1=1
AND patient.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{patientName},'%')
AND reserve.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND doctor.id = #{doctorId} AND reserve.state!=0

SELECT OrderForm.id,DATE_FORMAT(operatingTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') operatingTime,general.value orderState,doctor.name doctorName,patientInformation.name patientName ,department.name departmentName FROM OrderForm INNER JOIN reserve ON OrderForm.id=reserve.id AND doctorId=#{doctorId} INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON doctor.id=reserve.doctorId INNER JOIN patientInformation ON patientInformation.id-reserve.patientId INNER JOIN general ON coding=OrderForm.state INNER JOIN department ON department.id=did WHERE OrderForm.id=#{reserveId} GROUP BY OrderForm.id
SELECT drug.id,cover,drugName,price,orderDrug.number*price totalPrice,orderDrug.number number FROM orderDrug INNER JOIN drug ON orderDrug.drugId=drug.id WHERE orderDrug.orderId=#{id}
SELECT TIME_FORMAT(startTime,'%H:%i') startTime,TIME_FORMAT(endTime,'%H:%i') endTime FROM doctorDuty INNER JOIN dutyTime ON dutyTime.id=doctorDuty.dutyId WHERE doctorDuty.id=#{id}

SELECT reserve.id,doctor.name doctorName,patient.name patientName, DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') reserveTime, department.name departmentName,reserve.NumberReminders,reserve.state reserveState,patient.id patientId FROM reserve INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON doctor.id=reserve.doctorId INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON patient.id=reserve.patientId INNER JOIN department ON department.id=did WHERE 1=1
AND patient.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{patientName},'%')
AND reserve.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND doctor.id='1' AND reserve.state=0

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM reserve WHERE state=1 AND doctorId=#{doctorId}) overAppointmentNumber, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM reserve WHERE state=2 AND doctorId=#{doctorId}) appointmentNumber, COUNT(id) allAppointmentNumber FROM reserve WHERE doctorId=#{doctorId}
